meanings.definition: Happening or done once a year.
meanings.sent1: The yearly picnic is always a fun event for the whole community.
meanings.sent2: My family takes a yearly vacation to the beach every summer.
meanings.sent3: The yearly bake sale raised enough money to buy new books for the school library.
meanings.sent4: The yearly tradition of planting a tree symbolizes growth and renewal.
meanings.sent5: The yearly fireworks display lights up the night sky with bursts of color.

meanings.definition: Calculated or determined by the year.
meanings.sent1: The yearly budget is carefully planned to ensure financial stability.
meanings.sent2: The interest rate on the loan is compounded yearly.
meanings.sent3: The yearly calendar helps us keep track of important dates and events.
meanings.sent4: The yearly rainfall average is used to predict drought conditions.
meanings.sent5: The yearly report shows an increase in sales for the company.

meanings.definition: Lasting or continuing for a year.
meanings.sent1: The yearly subscription to the magazine includes twelve issues.
meanings.sent2: The plant's growth cycle is completed in a yearly cycle.
meanings.sent3: The yearly membership fee covers access to all facilities.
meanings.sent4: The yearly lease agreement ensures the tenant stays for a full year.
meanings.sent5: The yearly warranty guarantees product replacement within one year.
